project.description: This job uploads a specified docker image from the local repository to a specified docker registry

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ECR_REGISTRY_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Indicates the location of the elastic container registry (ECR) where the docker image is to be pushed to.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POM_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The maven version number for the war file the docker image being pushed is based on. Combined with ECR_URL, this value serves to identify the docker image as it will have been already tagged accordingly.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: PROFILE
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Determines which environment/landscape the deployment is for

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x
DOCKER_TAG="${ECR_REGISTRY_URL}/${POM_ARTIFACTID}:${POM_VERSION}"
# Login to the registry # NOTE: info on how to store credentials can be found at: # http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/topic/config-vars.html # requires ~/.aws/config eval $(/usr/local/aws/bin/aws ecr get-login --profile ${PROFILE})
# Push the newly created image to the registry docker push ${DOCKER_TAG}
set -x
